node.title: How to Fix Webpack Dynamic Import with Wrong Path
node.summary: When using the dynamic import for code splitting you'll need to specify the publicPath option to let Webpack know where your assets are.

node.title: What is a CNAME record
node.summary: CNAME stands for Canoncial Name. A CNAME record is an entry in the Domain Name System (DNS), that specifies that one domains is an alias of another canonical domain name.
